overview:
Himadri has eleven years of strong experience in software delivery, project management, client management, requirement management, software design, development & integration in Supply chain, e-commerce, logistics, clinical trial and telecom industry and ability to architect and develop high-level design. He has vast exposure of working directly for international client for more than 8 years that includes direct client management, build relationship with the customers and on site, off shore teams. He provides consulting of opening start up IT companies in Delhi NCR region and helping them out of their execution.

Key Skill Sets:

Setting Up Offshore companies in Delhi NCR Delivery And Project management People management Building and grooming the team Relationship with client and vendors Recruiting
